explains: n. 设陷阱捕兽者；捕捉器；[矿业] 矿井风门开关管理员

sentences.en: Then Clarence Birdseye, an American fur-trapper turned inventor, developed a system for freezing fish.
sentences.cn: 后来，由兽皮猎人转行的美国发明家克莱仁斯•伯兹艾，开发了一套冷冻鱼的设备。

sentences.en: Replaced one Troll Trapper with an equal level Ogre to the all troll trapper green camp next to each start location.
sentences.cn: 在小地图上所有显示绿色的怪物点，把一个巨魔改为一个同等级的食人魔。

sentences.en: He did not command the trapper to stop hunting. Instead, with his own imperial hands, he took down three sides of the nets, leaving only one side.
sentences.cn: 他没有命令猎人停止打猎，而是亲自拆除了网的三面，只留下一边。
